channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large dip / sinkhole returning, 15th February
item.description:
Large sinkhole / dip in the road returning as Road sinks at site if previous repairs.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 21 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very wide pothole, 15th February
item.description:
Very wide (60cm+) pothole around 4cm deep. Outside number 54 Carlton street

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Priory Terrace, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole, 15th February
item.description:
Pothole outside 50 Carlton street in middle of road. Can see surface beneath the tarmac.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Carlton Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Sinkhole forming on large stretch, 15th February
item.description:
Sinkhole problem on section of road from around 38 Carlton street about 46. thus problem is getting worse, and proving significant bouncing to cars travelling on the road - so will likely continue to get worse.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: About 8 potholes and road tears, 15th February
item.description:
Road complement falling apart in this section of Carlton Street, by Priory Street junction. About 8 potholes that are deep, as various road repairs fail.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Carlton Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collection of small potholes and damage, 15th February
item.description:
